title: Al Muqtadir (The Omnipotent) - Episode 2
description: An intriguing, interesting and exciting thriller series set in US. A story where a doctor does more than treating patients. A story where a son spies on his own father. A tale which gives insight of how news are fabricated. And stories of innocent people who sacrifice their life for someone who's hungry of power.It is full of suspense and surprises on every page.
author: Shakeeb Ahmad
